channel.title: Split screen Chat box And Stats Interface
channel.description:
i think this is a client, i want to split my private chat screen i forgot what to do any one....
and also how do i make the person on the stats Interface Appear cause its not its just a normal Bob Character.

item.title: Split screen Chat box And Stats Interface
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

on the stats interface? you mean shown equipment? or where you choose what you look like? and i dont know how to split the chat screen. But if it’s where you change your characther the interface id is 205… i believe.

Read full topic
item.source: Split screen Chat box And Stats Interface
